resources.string:
The Caption App 

 This app is a demo of image captioning using visual attention. 

 The inference is based on this Tensorflow example. 

 Code has been open-sourced at https://github.com/piyush-kgp/The-Caption-App 

 Developed by: Piyush Singh 

 Connect: Email, Github, Personal Website

New session usage is typically slow. 

 Speed is guaranteed to increase after running this test.

 You can verify that successive tests are much faster than first test.
